Iron Elephant Tattoo

About Us

Iron Elephant Tattoo is a custom tattoo shop nestled in the woods of Bend, Oregon - Quality tattoos in a friendly environment. We take pride in giving our customers a great tattoo with a great experience in our studio! I.E.T. is the hidden gem of Central Oregon! We work by appointments but always take walk-ins if we are able.

Chris "Calli" Callister
Andrew Parker
Mimzi Awtry
